title: Giorgi Leonidze Garden
about: Giorgi Leonidze Garden is located on Tabukashvili Street in Tbilisi. It is the lower part of the former Alexander Garden. Alexander Garden is divided into two parts by Tabukashvili Street, the upper part is called April 9 Garden. Alexander Garden was founded in the XIX century and it was the first public relaxing garden in Tbilisi. Leonidze Garden, which is deeply hidden in the greenery with a colorful mosaic pond, is one of the best places to have a rest. There is a monument of the famous Georgian writer Giorgi Leonidze in the garden. There are cafes and hotels around the park, where you can have relaxation and taste delicious food. There is also a theater on Atoneli and a national gallery near here, where you can have a look at the works of Georgian artists. You can also visit one of the cultural monuments of Tbilisi - Kashueti Church near Leonidze Garden.
